name: Call of Duty Zombies: Fan Made(itch)
name_original: Call of Duty Zombies: Fan Made(itch)
description:
This is a Prototype/Testing an Idea out to see my game developing Skills compared to the Original Game: Call of duty. i always wanted to make an Arcade Zombie Shooter. especially with the Unique Elements of the Call of duty Franchise.

You can play with Perks on 4 Different Maps, while also can play Online with your Friends/Family! through the Online Section (no LAN Unfortunately)

All rights belong to Activision and Treyarch.

Fan-Made game by Strikefall Studios

Publisher: Strikefall Studios

Developer: Yehia zein.

Only Available on Windows.

Controls:

W: Move Front

D: Move right

A: Move Left

S: Go Backwards

R: Reload

Left Mouse/Pad: Shoot

Right Mouse Click (Hold): Aim

Shift: Run

Note: the Online Servers are Possibly Bugged, and The zombies can get stuck in the walls.
